snippet: The 2008 playoff victory at Green Bay was great, but last season the Giants were soundly beaten, then marooned by a blizzard.
abstract: New York Giants players happily recall the 2008 playoff victory at Green Bay, but remember more acutely last season's drubbing by the Packers and then being marooned by a blizzard as they prepare for another playoff showdown at Lambeau Field.
lead_paragraph: The 2008 playoff victory at Green Bay was great, but last season the Giants were soundly beaten, then marooned by a blizzard.

headline.seo: For Giants, Memories of a Bad Trip That Wouldn’t End
headline.main: For Giants, Memories of a Bad Trip That Wouldn’t End
headline.print_headline: For Giants, Bad Memories Of a Blowout and a Blizzard
